there is no way to express in words, neither spoken nor written, to express the admiration, respect, and appreciation I have for all of you in this video and everyone that helps to make TBP what it is. I'll be honest, I don't have the kind of knowledge and expertise the founding fathers and sustainers of TBP have, but I promise every tool I DO have (word of mouth, knowledge of several languages, general annoyingness, ect ;)) at my disposal to do what I can for TBP and "piracy." I'm primarily a comic book nerd, a fan of caped-crusaders and superheroes, and truly, to me, you all are the modern-day equivalent of all my favorite Golden Age heroes. You are the true Robin Hoods and progressive activists of our era, and I stand behind you one million %. I'm sure you got a million haters hating everyday, so I hope you always keep in mind the greatest heroes of history were often the ones most persecuted in their time. 

In summary, you. are. truly. heroes.

I was a bit disappointed with this documentary -- but it sill had some really good parts (maybe I had too high of an expectation)...
In any case, I just wanted to comment on something that maybe someone else noticed too: when Fredrik marries his wife in Cambodia/Laos, the officer asks for money to be payed and they talk about 200.000 BAHT and 400.000 BAHT in case they divorce...those figures translate into €5 and €10, a very far cry from the $12.000 stated in the subtitles...somebody should check that out :-)

man, i love tpb, loved the documentary, but i'm probably gonna get shit for saying this. anyone else think peter sunde is the only one with balls?  gottfrid and fredrik both ran away to cambodia and laos while peter stayed and decided to face his punishment. I know he asked for a pardon, but he didn't run, hide and do drugs like gottfrid and he's not a racist prick like fredrik.  pretty comical when fredrik said something on the boat like "yeah, i'll do the prison time, but i'd rather not..." then you find out he got a reduced sentence from the original year he received and still fled the country and is wanted by interpol.  like i said, love tpb, but don't run like a bunch of cowards.

Full støtte fra deres naboer i vest.

Dere må sikte høyre enn dere gjør. Etter å ha sett filmen sitter jeg igjen med en følelse av at dere ikke forstår hvor viktige dere er. Dere forstår ikke hvor viktige dere er. Dere forstår ikke hvor viktige dere er.

Forsøk å forestille dere en verden uten åndsverklover og patenter. Alle fordeler dette vil gi krever en terabyte å nevne.

Det usunne system vi har i dag presser frem et ønske i industri om å ligge langt lenger forut for sin tid enn hva som er sunt for å bruke utviklingskroner på en mest mulig effektiv måte. Det er et visst krav om å få patent og i frykt for å komme under dette krav så siktes det høyt. Dette etterlater seg store huller av innsikt. Hvis utviklingen derimot går sakte frem og ingen tillates å gjøre store byks med beskyttelse fra bandittsat så vil vi på sikt få en fremtid som raskere byr på nyvinninger. Dette er det vesentlige argument imot patenter som åpenbart virker i mot sin hensikt hvis formål er nyvinninger.

Hva angår film og musikk så kan nøyaktig samme argumentasjon benyttes. Idag produses filmer til en milliard dollar kroner stykket med et spinkelt budskap nettopp fordi åndsverklover eksisterer. Uten disse lover ville ikke slike sinnsvake filmprosjekter påbegynnes. Vi ville heller få enkle filmer med et stort budskap. Således fungerer også åndsverklover i mot sin hensikt hvis formål er å få sunne og gode filmer. 

Vær så snill å se å skaffe dere et politisk ståsted der hvor dere åpenbart hører hjemme, ytterst til høyre. Dere ønsker utvikling, men ikke statsbeskyttelse for tull og fanteri. Dere trenger å ta et fast standpunkt politisk for å komme videre med hva som er viktig i denne sak.

Tackar massvis för denna!

Dear Internets! My name is Simon and I am the director/producer of the film TPB AFK: The Pirate Bay Away From Keyboard. After 5 years of hard work, it's a great pleasure to finally upload a torrent about this great website  onto the site itself. In a way, I guess TPB AFK has finally come home. This is not just a film about the founders of TPB, but also a film        about all of you who use the site. Please convert this film into all      possible formats and share it as much as you can! English subtitles are embedded into the movie.I've also made two folders with .srt and .sub subtitles.                 Feel free to translate them into whatever language you know! Will there be a hindi, japanese, swahili or a 1337 sp33k subtitle? Thank you!                                                               your peer,Simon Klose ,Check out our site for more info and exta material:                                                                                   http://www.tpbafk.tv

The difference between the "Good Guys' and the 'Bad Guys' is that Bad Guys are a company, corporation, etc, united and working as a team towards one goal usually headed by 1 person or a few persons with resources. The so called 'Good Guys' do not have organization or resources. And when they do, they also turn into the 'Bad Guy'. This is a never ending cycle and a nature of humanity. Yes there are scumbags out there. TPB shows that you don't really need Unity between seeders. We don't have to agree on anything at all, so as long as we do 1 thing which is called Pass it Forward. This is the essence of success for all of man kind. Give freely and it will come around. Only problem is, 1 small group just takes it, and gives nothing back. They will eventually be booted out of Evolution, but not any time soon. It's an evolutionary process which we all know takes A LONG LONG Time, but rest assured, we are all going to act like nature wants us to. That will never change, not about Humanity, nor about any other Living species. So you see, some people are Organized in their goal and it takes a few of them to control MANY who are not organized. But Like I said, if the 90 percent all act out whats in their nature (To go against the 10 percent) this tangle will always be present. Humanity depends on this cycle even though it is truly an embarrassment to our existence.

I'm generally dissapointed by the lack of moral and ethic questions not placed by defendents... No wonder: Fredrik obviously don't really understand a thing about wrongness of copyright. Gottfrid is not much better than him, and only Peter is worth something, but I still do think he could defend himself much much better.

They just didn't defend them very well, that's my impression, not that I think the verdict would be different, but they just didn't do all they can. They really need to understand my "4-points against copyrights"... wink.gif

1) Nobody has a moral right to forbid you to push any virtual on-screen buttons, whatever you do by that. Or surf wherever you like...
2) Nobody can proove 1 copy is equal to 1 sale. Or less, or more... Nobody can quantify that, there's no relation between.
3) When you copy something - you multiply it, you don't steal anything from anyone because he still has it.
4) Digial goods are new and very special kind of goods - As much as the facility of copying is crippling in the sense of economy, in the same time it helps real quality products to spread more easily on the web, making them better product for (digital) sales... What we have here is actually natural quality selection of digital goods.
